Posts.Content: Hi, for anyone local every Tuesday 6.30pm at Hawkhill Social Club in Guiseley we meet up.  More info on  leedswest.wix.com/abcgroup We are a lovely friendly group, join us for a cuppa, chat and more than likely some laughs. We also have a local Facebook support group called https://www.facebook.com/groups/Cancerfightingwarriors/ Thanks
Posts.Title: Friendly supportive group for people affected by cancer in Guiseley...
